casebody.data:
THOMAS JEFFERSON CLASSICAL ACADEMY CHARTER SCHOOL, et al.
v.
CLEVELAND COUNTY BOARD OF EDUCATION. No. 400A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 4, 2016. Deborah R. Stagner, Raleigh, for Cleveland County Board of Education. Richard A. Vinroot, Charlotte, for Thomas Jefferson Classical Academy Charter School, et al. Matthew F. Tilley, Charlotte. Amanda R. Pickens, Charlotte. Christine T. Scheef, Staff Attorney, for NC School Boards Association. Allison B. Schafer, Legal Counsel/Director of Policy, for NC School Boards Association.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of December 2015 by NC School Boards Association for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of January 2016."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
